feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Standardize button sizes in client portal by @hillelcoren in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9754
  • Enable selfhost admins to view the last error from storage/logs by @hillelcoren in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9755
  • Add OPENEXCHANGE_APP_ID to .env by @CodeShakingSheep in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9758
  • Add queue stats to the health check stats by @hillelcoren in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9762
  • Fix for 'Table ninja.accounts doesn't exist' by @hillelcoren in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9763
  • Fix edge cases to ensure /setup loads by @hillelcoren in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9764
  • Improvements to setup process by @hillelcoren in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9769
  • Added pending database migrations to the health check by @hillelcoren in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9770

New Contributors

  • @CodeShakingSheep made their first contribution in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9758

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.8...v5.10.9

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update translations by @beganovich in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9774
  • Fix for setup error introduced with migration check by @hillelcoren in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9772
  • Feature: Option for xml-attachments in the e-mail by @LarsK1 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9771
  • Minor fixes by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9776
  • Minor fixes by @LarsK1 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9777
  • Dubai timezone by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9779
  • Add option to attach ubl/einvoice to emails by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9781
  • v5.10.10 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9782

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.9...v5.10.10

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.11
New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.10.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for paypal autobilling
  • Fixes for twig templates by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9793
  • v5.10.12 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/9797

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.10.11...v5.10.12
